title: Navigate between days on Scoreboard
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user of the TV app is viewing the scoreboard

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user has navigated to a date other than the current date
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the scoreboard displays the games on that date 
AND those games do not change.
Wait on page to insure games do not change.

title: Fire TV/ Android TV  Login
custom_steps: WHEN they are on the login screen
custom_expected:
THEN they are presented static messaging
AND the background will contain their favorite team image
AND an empty email and password field
AND an eye button icon that is by default hiding the password
AND an inactive login button
AND a cancel button

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN they are on the login screen
AND the email and password field have been filled in
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the login button will be active

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN they are on the login screenAND the eye button icon is enabled
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the password field will show as plain text

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user successfully attempts to login
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be navigated to the home page
(Eventually will display user information on the header as a separate item)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks on the cancel button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be navigated to the previous screen

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user unsuccessfully attempts to login

title: Onboarding: Favorite Team Picker
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an Amazon Fire TV or Android TV device
and has the MLB app installed for the first time
custom_steps: When they land on the favorite teams page
custom_expected: Then the next button is inaccessible until a team is selected

custom_steps_separated.content: When app opens the favorite teams page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should see a list of unselected team tiles in order of division
And a center pane will appear with a static MLB logo and static messaging

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user selects a team tile
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then it will highlight the team tile to the dark team color with the star
And the cursor will focus on the activated “next” button

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user selects a favorite team tile 
And a favorite team is already selected
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the new favorite team tile will be dark and starred and the former favorite team tile be be unselectedAnd the curser will focus on the activated “next” button
Then the app navigates to the home page
